column1: Review
Tasty good taste quantity and qualitative food.
While all the dishes were prepared fresh, the taste was average. Not the right place for Indo Chinese food :(
Best biryani

nargis tawa masala is best in taste
Mashroom Cheese bomb are so delicious and tasty
delivered soya chaap instead of paneer Tikka
Chaap was amazing just loved it....khichdi was too salty.the butter salt plus salt in khichdi resulted in spoiling the dish.but the chaaps are amazing must try
biryani was horrible, threw 70percent of it, soup was better
The dal makhni is to die for, the tandoori chicken has minimal. colour, just the way it should be.
Rice had egg despite of adding cooking instructions
Great quantity, great taste
I was ordered veg Kolhapur they give me Mattar paneer it's not at all acceptable.wrost food delivery ever
unhappy with crispy and lollypop
too salty much disappointed
Should not use Plastic, use Silver foils, because due to hot stuff, Plastic can melt.
The keema which was ordered had only masala and no keema . take the feedback positively!.
portion size became small day by day
